script: There is a Park in the center of my hometown.
Hospital is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, East from Park.
Library is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, South from Hospital.
I visited Retail Area, which is 3 KM, East from Library.
Museum is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, East from Retail Area.
And finally there is Statue of Founder which is East from Museum and 1 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Park to Statue of Founder following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Park, go 1km East to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km South to Library.
From Library, go 3km East to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 3km East to Museum.
From Museum, go 1km East to Statue of Founder.
